Fire Spotter.desc: Slightly increases chance to hit when on Direct Fire action.

MG Spotter.desc: Greatly increases chance to hit when on Direct Fire action and tank is firing a machine gun.

Gun Spotter.desc: Greatly increases chance to hit when on Direct Fire action and tank is firing a gun.

Driver Direction.desc: Increases modifier when on Direct Movement action.

Quick Trigger.desc: Higher chance of maintaining Rate of Fire when firing a Gun.

Knows Weak Spots.desc: Higher chance of scoring a Critical Hit when firing a Gun.

Target Tracker.desc: Lower penalty when firing at a moving vehicle target.

Fast Hands.desc: Higher chance of maintaining Rate of Fire when reloading a Gun.

Quick Shifter.desc: Higher chance of a successful Move Forward or Backward action.

Eye for Cover.desc: When hatch is open, bonus to achieve Hull Down status after moving.

Eagle Eyed.desc: When hatch is open, bonus to spot and identify enemy units.
